snippet.title: Game Boy Advance Longplay [226] Action Man: Robot Atak
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: xRavenXP

This is a longplay of Action Man: Robot Atak is an action game, developed by Magic Pockets and published by Atari, which was released for GBA only in Europe in 2004.
Professor Moran is kidnapped by villain Dr. X, and it is up to the Action Force to bring him back. The playable characters of this game are Action Man, Red Wolf, and Flynt (and Kongo in some stages). Together, they beat up robots, punch dinosaurs, ride jet skis, and do other typical action-movie things along the way. Is a action plataform game. The video was done in Adventure Mode and Advanced Mode (with more stages and enemies, where to clear the stages is necessary to collect a minimum of action symbols in stages). -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
